description:
GLOS blockchain aspires to be an entertainment industry-specific blockchain.

It is creating the world’s premier entertainment technology blockchain with the aim of improving the acquisition, retention, and monetization for entertainment industry apps. GLOS provide tools and protocols, for free, to apps built on the blockchain. It also helps app creators understand their data as well as the aggregated on chain data better. App creators on the GLOS blockchain get to monetize the data that they collect as well as benefit from cross app selling and marketing recommendations.
name: GLOS
